messageBody:
Steve,

We create a Suite using:

@RunWith(Suite.class)
@SuiteClasses({A.class, B.class, ...})
public class MySuite {}

and then point the IDE to just run the MySuite, rather than gathering
all the classes in the package.

David Saff
